Uses of Interface
org.elkoserver.foundation.net.ByteIOFramerFactory

  • Packages that use ByteIOFramerFactory 
    Package Description
    org.elkoserver.foundation.net
    Classes for message communication over the TCP and HTTP for Elko.

    • Uses of ByteIOFramerFactory in org.elkoserver.foundation.net

      Classes in org.elkoserver.foundation.net that implement ByteIOFramerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HTTPRequestByteIOFramerFactory
      Byte I/O framer factory for HTTP requests.
      class  JSONByteIOFramerFactory
      Byte I/O framer factory for JSON messaging over a byte stream.
      class  RTCPRequestByteIOFramerFactory
      Byte I/O framer factory for RTCP requests.
      class  WebSocketByteIOFramerFactory
      Byte I/O framer factory for WebSocket connections, a perverse hybrid of HTTP and TCP.

      Make a TCP connection to another host given a host:port address.

      Begin listening for incoming TCP connections on some port.
